Package template

Class Main

java.lang.Object
template.Main
public class Main extends Object
This application XXX does XXX (main entry) - it's your project and I don't know it. Delete or comment out all things you don't need (or believe so ;-). The amount of empty lines in Main is for readability of the template - not my programming style.

    • exitOnException

      public static void exitOnException(Exception e)
      Logs an Exception and performs System.exit(1) WITHOUT closing anything except the Logger. Add what you need (file closing, AppProperties storing, etc).
      Parameters:
      e - the Exception
